amendment.description: Amendment includes retrofitting advanced vehicle technologies to existing vehicles as an area of research under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-255 to include retrofitting advanced vehicle technologies to existing vehicles as an area of research under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Peters.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
